original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pacchato gacchantā purato gacchantassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
“Na pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: ▁na ▁pacchato ▁gacchant o ▁purato ▁gacchant assa ▁a gilān assa ▁dhammaṃ ▁des essāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti

original: Na pacchato gacchantena purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁pacchato ▁gacchant o ▁purato ▁gacchant assa ▁a gilān assa ▁dhammaṃ ▁des eti ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
